comment.realname: The Magnes Collection of Jewish Art and Life
comment.author: 12090437@N04
comment._content: Thank you for posting this. You can view the "Lilienthal" Torah Binder in the Magnes collection at: www.flickr.com/photos/magnesmuseum/4558791104. See the Magnes Collection Online database record here

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Thanks for letting us know! This is a beautiful binder and what a nice image! We have two more Torah binders on Flickr from the Yeshiva University Museum: www.flickr.com/photos/center_for_jewish_history/385970395... This one has a link to the high resolution image in the Flickr description: http://www.flickr.com/photos/center_for_jewish_history/3858890449/in/set-72157622664649073/

comment.realname: The Magnes Collection of Jewish Art and Life
comment.author: 12090437@N04
comment._content: We have now uploaded all of the images (141) of our Torah binders we have available. You can see the entire set here: www.flickr.com/photos/magnesmuseum/sets/72157623874876689/
